\documentclass{standalone}
\usepackage{tikz}

\begin{document}
\begin{tikzpicture}[scale=4]
\node at (0.5, -0.1) {\small \( n = 2 \)};
\draw (1, 0) arc (0:90:1);
\draw[->] (-0.05, 0) -- (1.2, 0);
\draw[->] (0, -0.05) -- (0, 1.2);
\draw (0, 1) -- (0.545329, 1.000000);
\draw (0.545329, 1.000000) -- (0.5453289254261224, 0.8382221442395749);
\fill (0, 1) circle (0.005);
\draw (0.5453289254261224, 0.8382221442395749) -- (0.707107, 0.838222);
\draw (0.707107, 0.838222) -- (0.7071067811865476, 0.7071067811865476);
\fill (0.5453289254261224, 0.8382221442395749) circle (0.005);
\draw (0.7071067811865476, 0.7071067811865476) -- (0.838222, 0.707107);
\draw (0.838222, 0.707107) -- (0.8382221442395748, 0.5453289254261223);
\fill[blue] (0.7071067811865476, 0.7071067811865476) circle (0.005);
\draw (0.8382221442395748, 0.5453289254261223) -- (1.000000, 0.545329);
\draw (1.000000, 0.545329) -- (1, 0);
\fill (0.8382221442395748, 0.5453289254261223) circle (0.005);
\fill (1, 0) circle (0.005);
\end{tikzpicture}
\end{document}
